resources.string: Are you sure this blue is the same as the blue over there? This wall’s like the bottom of a pool, its color I mean. I need a darker two-piece this summer, the kind with elastic at the waist so it actually fits. I can’t find her hands. Where does this gold go? It’s like the angel’s giving her a little piece of honeycomb to eat. I don’t see why God doesn’t just come down and kiss her himself. This is the red of that lipstick we saw at the mall. This piece of her neck could fit into the light part of the sky. I think this is a piece of water. What kind of queen? You mean right here? And are we supposed to believe she can suddenly talk angel? Who thought this stuff up? I wish I had a velvet bikini. That flower’s the color of the veins in my grandmother’s hands. I wish we could walk into that garden and pick an X-ray to float on. Yeah. I do too. I’d say a zillion yeses to anyone for that.
